AI Description: Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data. It is an open-source, freely available chemical software package designed to handle molecular data. It allows conversion of chemical file formats, visualization of molecular structures, and provides various tools for molecular descriptor calculations and 2D depiction.
Core Features: Conversion Of Chemical File Formats, Visualization Of Molecular Structures, Molecular Descriptor Calculations, 2D Depiction Of Molecules
General Tags: Chemical Informatics, Chemical Data Processing, Chemical File Format Conversion, Molecular Visualization
